articles.title: 6 lies Joe Biden told about Afghanistan - New York Post
articles.description: The Post Editorial Board brings the receipts on President Joe Biden’s biggest lies on Afghanistan, the Taliban and his utter failure to evacuate Americans, reporters and Afghan allies.
articles.content:
